title: Data Quality Tools Market 2015 Review, Research, Industry Analysis, Trends and Forecast 2019
content: at 15:02 PM EDT Deerfield Beach, FL -- (SBWIRE) -- 09/18/2015 -- Data quality tools refer to the wide range of tools required for ensuring quality and reliability of data in various business processes including core business operations, BI, analytics, and decision making. Global Data Quality Tools market to grow at a CAGR of 17.11% over the period 2014-2019. The data quality vendors offer a wide range of functionalities including data profiling, monitoring, parsing, standardization, and data enrichment. These tools are applied on customer data, financial data, and product data to improve the quality of data. Many organizations use data quality tools to avail the benefits of Big Data.
